import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; export default class CheckoutSmallFruits extends Component { constructor() { super(); const [formData, SetFormData] = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", phone: "", address: "", address2: "", state: "", city: "", zip: "", deliveryTime: "", frequency: "", boxType: "" }; const { firstName, lastName, email, phone, address, address2, state, city, zip, deliveryTime, frequency, boxType } = formData; } componentDidMount() { // this.setState({ // firstName: firstName, // lastName: lastName, // email: email, // phone: phone, // address: address, // address2: address2, // state: state, // city: city, // zip: zip, // deliveryTime: deliveryTime, // frequency: frequency, // boxType: boxType // }) } render() { return (
